places.name: Tirupati
places.description: Tirupati is famous for Sri Venkateswara Temple, a popular Hindu pilgrimage site.

places.name: Araku Valley
places.description: Araku Valley is a beautiful hill station known for coffee plantations and waterfalls.

places.name: Vishakhapatnam Beach
places.description: Known for scenic beaches like RK Beach, Yarada Beach, and serene coastline.

places.name: Lepakshi
places.description: Lepakshi is known for its stunning Veerabhadra Temple and the famous hanging pillar.

places.name: Srisailam
places.description: Srisailam is home to the famous Mallikarjuna Jyotirlinga temple, a sacred pilgrimage site.

places.name: Horsley Hills
places.description: Horsley Hills is a beautiful hill station known for its cool climate and scenic beauty.

places.name: Borra Caves
places.description: Borra Caves are famous for their stunning stalactites and stalagmites formations.

places.name: Gandikota Fort
places.description: Gandikota is known as the 'Grand Canyon of India' for its breathtaking gorge and fort.

places.name: Ahobilam
places.description: Ahobilam is a famous pilgrimage site dedicated to Lord Narasimha.
